title: Bill Gates says AI can make the world a "more equitable place"
description:
The Microsoft co-founder published his predictions for AI in the forthcoming year and said he believes AI technology can be used to make the world a “more equitable place.”

Bill Gates, the investor and Microsoft co-founder, said he believes artificial intelligence (AI) can make the world a “more equitable place” in his 2024 predictions blog post. 

The billionaire entrepreneur said if smart investments are made now, AI can be used to lessen or even “eliminate” the time between new innovations reach the “rich world” and the “poor world.”

According to Gates, the main lessons to take away from AI use cases, particularly in the global health industries, is that the AI products must be more tailored to the people who will use them.

Read more

title: BlackRock Seeds Bitcoin ETF With $10M, Analyst Predicts January Approval
description:
In a recent update, the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, has submitted an amended Form S-1 with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for their Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), fueling rumors of a possible January launch.
